Html:
Does anyone know in what cases the ISAPI dll needs to be registered as a COM server (regsvr32)? I created with vs.net 2005 two projects. One just a basic web service. The default code created by the wizard does not have any com registrations.

Then I created another project as basic as the first one but I added the default perf counters. In this case the generated code specify that the ISAPI dll should be registered.

So when does the ISAPI dll must be registered?

Thanks,

G.
